TextBlock.Text: DAZ: Phlox, when you have time to spare after toiling away at your statues, I require more flat templates soon to craft more projection stones!
PHLOX: Of course! I enjoy the simplicity of sculpting those templates for a change. But did I not deliver you several stacks of templates recently?
DAZ: The voyager stone's development is nearing completion! I require more templates to craft and test more projection locations before I can be confident in its use.
DAZ: You should pair with a memory statue too, so you can test out the voyager stone sometime, Phlox!
PHLOX: Oh, I was not aware one needed to be paired to the memory storage system to use them! Is there any reason why that is a prerequisite?

DAZ: The voyager stones are designed to work with the memory storage system so that memories are stored and transferred to the individual, allowing them to <color=orange>explore remotely beyond a projection pool.</color>
DAZ: Without the individual being manually paired to a memory statue first, I'm afraid the voyager stone would be little more than an ordinary projection stone in function!
